alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 22 at 2:31AM MDT until March 22 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Storm total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Central Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
